function_description: Filter projects or boards using the filtering function.
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and the sidebar is visible.
steps: Locate the filtering function at the top of the sidebar.
Click on the two arrows icon to select whether to filter projects (P) or boards (B).
Enter a keyword or part of a word to filter the list.
Click on the 'x' icon to clear the filtering.
expected_state: The list of projects or boards is filtered based on the user's input, showing only the relevant items. Clearing the filter restores the full list.
